title: Boxing Fans File Lawsuits After Pacquiao-Mayweather Fight
teaser: More than 30 lawsuits have been filed by boxing fans, bettors and sports bars around the country, alleging that the so-called "fight of the century," between Floyd Mayweather Jr. and Manny Pacquiao was a fraud. They're suing for their money back and, in some cases, damages.
contentencoded: Copyright 2015 NPR. To see more, visit http://www.npr.org/.
